name: Square Off: The Rosetta Stoned Remix
description:
Square Off - The Rosetta Stoned Remix is a labyrinth game where the player has to reach the exit without getting trapped or killed. The game area consists of a board with 9 x 9 squares. The start is marked 'S' and the end is marked with a red/orange circle. There are several special squares:
  • Squares the gives points: These are marked with the number of points they give
  • One direction squares: An arrow marks the travel direction
  • Two direction squares: A double headed arrow shows if the player can pass it horizontally or vertically
  • Fire squares: Can fire in one or two directions. These can be used to kill monsters
  • Teleport: These are marked with a T and teleport the player
  • Monster generator: These are marked with a M and will generate monsters when moved over
From level 7 monsters starts to appear on the board. If the player touches a monster a life is lost.
